Body Copy / Roboto Sans-Serif 300 / < 1rem/1.5rem

We design answers. Our purpose is to realise potential. Our role is to help brands become more successful. Our shopper-centric approach has been crafted over 30 years to simplify brand choice and connect consumers to brands. Every brand has the potential to be more. Born in Australia, Cowan blends ambition with strategy to create, shape and reframe brands to captivate and engage. 1234567890*!&£$@

Collateral

Stationery

Suite of digital & print applications of the new identity.

Packaging

A retail background in a design agency founder is unexpected, although it helps explain why Cowan is a little different. Mark Cowan’s passion for understanding shopper behaviour began while working in stores at Australian Safeway. He observed shopper patterns with interest and was intrigued. When he moved into a marketing and buying role, he saw countless launches and a common success factor was how much packaging influenced shoppers.

e-Commerce

Suite of digital applications using the new identity.
